Player History
Hit for the cycle against Malibu on 8/31/1982...
Signed as a free agent by New Jersey on 3/1/1987 to a minor league contract.
Traded from New Jersey to Pontiac on 5/1/1989 (Going to PON: SS A. Romero. Going to NJ: P B. Peña, P J. Bryant, P A. Young)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1989...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
